segments.text: I think the woman is really focused on drying those dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't even glanced at the sink, let alone the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge, and she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so brave, climbing up on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really reaching for those cookies, determined to get them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so sweet, just waiting for her brother to share with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll get away with it, or if the woman will catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting so wet, it's going to be slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a silent movie, everything happening without a sound.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit tense, waiting to see what will happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR
